summary: Case management system with sorting functionality for case cards

existing_features.title: Add a sorting control UI component to the CasesListView that allows users to select sort order with options: 'Arrival Date (Newest First)', 'Arrival Date (Oldest First)', 'Open Tasks (Most First)', and 'Open Tasks (Fewest First)'

Implement sorting logic that reorders the displayed case cards based on the selected sort option, using the arrivalDate field for date sorting and counting uncompleted checklist items for task status sorting
Ensure the sorting persists when users perform other actions like searching, creating new cases, updating cases, or toggling checklist items

new_feature_requests.summary: Add sorting method for case cards by arrival date and task status/open tasks

projectName: Add sorting for case cards by arrival date and task status
